landing.bio: Experienced Software Engineer with 6+ years of experience in Java-based backend development, microservice architecture, and high-availability systems. Skilled in designing scalable payment systems, developing REST APIs, and optimizing application performance. Proven ability to debug, monitor, and enhance systems in production environments with a strong foundation in computer science principles.

experience.aboutWork: Designed and developed a hotel extranet portal, Designed and implemented a tool to optimize revenue for hotel bookings, Developed an interactive UI for B2B and corporate users, Integrated more than 4 travel partner APIs in our system (Agoda, Ratehawk, GetaRooms, BedsOnline)
Collaborated with the IoT middleware team to design and build ads scheduling APIs for IoT devices such as soundbox. Integrated some AWS services to support ad playback on 20 million devices.

I worked as a part of the Singapore Flight dev team, handling the  and india division. Created Galileo api Searcher, Then Worked as a part of Hotel dev Team, handling all divisions including India and International (8 Countries). Integrated end to end flow of suppliers like Expedia, Cleartrip, tbo and Miki Api’s. Created various Via outbound hotels api’s for client booking. Created Hotel Analytics dashboard using Kafka, Collaborated with Google Hotel Finder (GHF) integration
Created hybrid attribute-based recommender system for product recommendation using genetic algorithm and multidimensional information model.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science & Engineering

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a software developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. I am passionate about photography and sports (Cricket, Table-tennis, Badminton, Basketball, Bollyball)
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the consumer tech field like new products and apps..

awards.awardDetail: Winner of Coding Arena Programming Competition 1.0
Certified Java from Tech raga Training and Development PVT.LTD
Certified Bigdata Hadoop from VMDD Technologies & Hackveda Appsec Labs
